testcase.classname: An administrator (admin) should be able to access the deposit list via the API connection.
testcase.name: Verify the information returned in the response for the one with Id(x)
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "api/deposit/list" path parameters..................passed And The API user records the response from the api deposit list endpoint with valid authorization information.passed Then Verify the information of the one with the index 1 in the API user response body: 22, 1000, "4500.00000000", "USD", "190.00000000", "1.00000000", "4690.00000000", "0", "V4R7WR3UG7VP", 0, 2, 0, "2023-12-17T13:35:08.000000Z", "2023-12-17T13:35:14.000000Z".passed
